title: Build with Blocks. Learn by Doing.
subtitle: Design programs visually using Blockly. Switch languages, toggle dark mode, and export your projects with a single click.
confirmDiscard: Discard all blocks? This cannot be undone.

docs.title: MyBlockly Documentation
docs.subtitle: Learn about all available blocks and how to use them in your projects.

if.name: if
if.description: Executes code if a condition is true
if.example: Check if a number is positive

ifElse.name: if-else
ifElse.description: Executes one block of code if a condition is true, and another if false

comparison.name: comparison
comparison.code:
a == b  // equal to
a != b  // not equal to
a < b   // less than
a > b   // greater than
a <= b  // less than or equal to
a >= b  // greater than or equal to

logicalOperators.name: logical operators
logicalOperators.code:
condition1 && condition2  // AND
condition1 || condition2  // OR
!condition               // NOT

null.name: null
null.description: Represents an empty or non-existent value

ternary.name: ternary operator
ternary.description: Returns one value if condition is true, another if false

repeat.name: repeat
repeat.description: Repeats code a specified number of times

while.name: while
while.description: Repeats code while a condition is true

repeatUntil.name: repeat until
repeatUntil.description: Repeats code until a condition becomes true

countWith.name: count with
countWith.description: Loops with a counter variable from start to end

forEach.name: for each
forEach.description: Iterates over items in a list

continueLoop.name: continue loop
continueLoop.description: Skips to the next iteration of the loop

arithmetic.name: arithmetic
arithmetic.code:
a + b  // addition
a - b  // subtraction
a * b  // multiplication
a / b  // division
a % b  // modulo (remainder)

mathFunctions.name: math functions
mathFunctions.code:
Math.abs(x)     // absolute value
Math.sqrt(x)    // square root
Math.pow(x, y)  // x to the power of y
Math.round(x)   // round to nearest integer
Math.random()   // random number between 0 and 1

trigFunctions.name: trig functions
trigFunctions.code:
Math.sin(x)
Math.cos(x)
Math.tan(x)
Math.asin(x)
Math.acos(x)
Math.atan(x)

numberProperty.name: number property
numberProperty.code:
isEven(x)
isOdd(x)
isPrime(x)
isWhole(x)
isPositive(x)
isNegative(x)

round.name: round
round.code:
Math.round(x)  // round
Math.ceil(x)   // round up
Math.floor(x)  // round down

constrain.name: constrain
constrain.description: Limit a number to be within a range

randomInteger.name: random integer
randomInteger.description: Generate a random integer between two values

randomFraction.name: random fraction
randomFraction.description: Generate a random number between 0 and 1

setVariable.name: set variable
setVariable.description: Change the value of a variable

getVariable.name: get variable
getVariable.description: Get the value of a variable

defineFunction.name: define function

returnValue.name: return value
returnValue.description: Return a value from a function

createList.name: create list
createList.description: Create a new list with items

createListWith.name: create list with
createListWith.description: Create a list with a repeated item

listLength.name: list length
listLength.description: Get the number of items in a list

listIsEmpty.name: list is empty
listIsEmpty.description: Check if list has no items

findItemInList.name: find item in list
findItemInList.description: Find the position of an item in a list

getItem.name: get item
getItem.description: Get an item from a list by index
getItem.code: let item = myList[index];  // index starts at 0

setItem.name: set item
setItem.description: Change the value of an item in a list

getAndRemoveItem.name: get and remove item
getAndRemoveItem.description: Get an item and remove it from the list

removeItem.name: remove item
removeItem.description: Remove an item from a list

getSublist.name: get sublist
getSublist.description: Get a portion of a list

splitTextIntoList.name: split text into list
splitTextIntoList.description: Convert text into a list by splitting

joinListIntoText.name: join list into text
joinListIntoText.description: Convert a list into text by joining

sortList.name: sort list
sortList.code:
myList.sort()  // numeric ascending
myList.sort().reverse()  // numeric descending
myList.sort()  // alphabetic ascending
myList.sort().reverse()  // alphabetic descending

reverseList.name: reverse list
reverseList.description: Reverse the order of items in a list

appendText.name: append text
appendText.description: Add text to the end of a variable

textLength.name: text length
textLength.description: Get the length of a text string

findText.name: find text
findText.description: Find the position of text within text

getCharacter.name: get character
getCharacter.description: Get a specific character from text

changeCase.name: change case
changeCase.description: Convert text to uppercase or lowercase

trimText.name: trim text
trimText.description: Remove spaces from both sides of text
